page.title: 04Vandalism
page.content:
{Vandalism}is damage or destruction to property it could be a smashed window or writing on walls.Recently the {Coronation Parks,tennis counts and {bowling greens}were ripped up and generally made a mess of.The new {community centre}does not look so new the door is scratched .When walls are newly painted or when fences are put up they seemed to get written on. Bus shelters are a favourite too.At Chistmas the{Chistmas tree}on the green is pushed over.The daffodills are trodden on.The Library is often Vandalised .New things are damaged because they may be bright and shining so they draw attention to themselves.
{
